glosses: to suffer from a skin disease
H6879.def: = state in which humans suffer from a condition that affects the skin, which probably covers diseases such as psoriasis, favus, leucoderma; ► a person who suffers from this disease is considered ritually unclean, and therefore unable to participate in worship; ≈ regarded as infectious, and seen as a curse and a punishment from God

H2100.def: = process whereb liquids move freely as in a stream

H6153.def: = the time of day when the sun starts going down, when people leave their work and go home, have food, and go to sleep; this is also the time of the evening sacrifice, and the time when an unclean person who has gone through the cleansing rituals is declared clean, when fasting and mourning come to an end, and when the exposed body of an executed person needs to be removed

H7364.def: = causative action by which humans or animals wash (part of) their own body or someone else's body or another object, usually with water, ► in order to remove any dirt; ≈ the resulting cleanness often symbolizes ritual cleanness, innocence, or even holiness

H1320.def: = the soft substance in the body of humans and animals that consists of muscle tissue and fat

H4325.def: = water as the indispensible liquid on which the existence of all life depends, used for drinking, preparing food, washing, irrigating, etc.; found under the earth, on the earth, and above the earth; sometimes used as a euphemism to denote certain body liquids; ≈ associated with abundance and refreshment, but also with instability, and danger, etc.

H8121.def: = celestial body ► that marks day and night and produces warmth and light for the earth

H3775.def: = young of a sheep, either male or female; ► clean animal, and allowed for food; also used for sacrifice

H7716.def: = an individual member of a group of {L:sheep<SDBH:כֶּבֶשׂ>} and {L:goats<SDBH:עֵז>} traveling and feeding together

H7038.def: = state in which an animal has a limb that is relatively short in size

H7521.def: = state in which an animal or its meat is acceptable to God as sacrifice

H5088.def: = action by which humans make a solemn promise to a deity, ► which signals a commitment to perform a certain act or behave in a specific way, usually in return for a blessing from the deity

H7126.def: = action by which humans or animals move to a location relatively close to the location in focus

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H4600.def: = action by which humans press softly on an object

H3807.def: = causative action by which humans use excessive power to break an object into little pieces

H3772.def: = causative action by which humans use a knife or another sharp implement to remove something from a larger object

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H5236.def: = state in which something is associated with a nation or country that is different from one's own

H7126.def: = action by which humans or animals move to a location relatively close to the location in focus

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3899.def: = a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H7521.def: = state in which an animal or its meat is acceptable to God as sacrifice

H3971.def: = state in which humans or animals have a physical defect on their body

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H4872.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3775.def: = young of a sheep, either male or female; ► clean animal, and allowed for food; also used for sacrifice

H176.def: = particle linking two entities by which X and Y are alternative options that exclude each other

H5795.def: = a fairly small, female domestic animal, usually black and with floppy ears, hooves and relatively short hair, and usually found in one single {L:flock<SDBH:צֹאן>} with sheep; ► raised for its milk, meat, and skin; a clean animal and therefore to be eaten

H517.def: = direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine

H7651.def: = state in which a countable entity is seven in number

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H7521.def: = state in which an animal or its meat is acceptable to God as sacrifice

H801.def: = action by which humans offer something to a deity by burning it partially or in its entirety on the altar; considered to have a pleasing aroma

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H2076.def: = causative action by which humans kill one or more animals, usually for food

H8426.def: = action by which humans publicly admit their own shortcomings before God, or the shortcomings of the people they represent

H2077.def: = the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and the other part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H7522.def: = state in which deities or humans in a position of authority are favorable disposed towards a person or activity

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H3498.def: = state in which humans, animals, or objects remain in a certain place after part of the original quantity has been located elsewhere

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H1242.def: = first half of the day, ranging from daybreak until noon; ≈ used figuratively to denote relief after a time of suffering, and associated with good as opposed to evil

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H8104.def: = action by which humans or deities carefully observe an object or event for a longer period of time

H4687.def: = causative action by which humans or deities prescribe or instruct (other) humans or themselves how to behave or respond to a situation

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H6944.def: = state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H6942.def: = action by which humans that are part of a {L:holy<SDBH:קָדֹושׁ>} nation set themselves apart from others by not engaging in activities that are not in accordance with God's law

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
